Tyler Epperson

Hello, World!

My name is Tyler, I'm a computer science student at Southern New Hampshire University finishing up the final touches on my degree. I've also had the amazing oppotunity to work in the field during my tenure in school with two amazing companies who have helped shape me professionally. Throughout my coursework I have expanded my knowledge in database design and architecture with courses that focus on data mining and realtional databases. Algorithms used to analyze large subsets of data and front-end presentations such as graphical user interfaces and web applications.


My ultimate goal is to become a full-stack web developer in the wake of finishing my degree.


This blog is a small collection of some of the work I have had the opporunity to work on throughout my coursework. In each of these posts I will discuss some of the projects I've worked on and analyze some of them for possible improvements and alterations.
